hero.name: Enzo Vasconcelos
hero.description: Software Developer with experience in software development, interface design and project management.

about.title: Who Am I?
about.intro: I'm a Full Stack Developer focused on building high-performance web applications and scalable interfaces.
about.paragraph1: I find it easy to learn new technologies, work in teams, and tackle technical challenges with an analytical mindset. I value clear communication, collaboration, and continuous improvement. I'm always looking to grow, take on new challenges, and participate in projects that make a real difference.
about.paragraph2: I like building applications that not only work but are well-structured, performant, and pleasant to use. For me, code isn't just about logic—it's also intimately connected to the business and the application's infrastructure.
about.paragraph3: After the pandemic, I enrolled in Computer Engineering to formalize my knowledge. Since then, I've had the opportunity to work on high-impact projects, including solutions for union areas in the State of Alagoas and a healthcare project that helped over 1600 doctors in the State.

skills.title: Skills & Knowledge
skills.subtitle: Technologies and competencies I use to create high-impact solutions
skills.communicationDesc: Effective communication between technical and product areas

contact.title: Let's Work Together?
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to new projects and opportunities. Get in touch and let's turn your idea into reality.
contact.findMe: or find me on social media
